15 ohu mata thawaduratath katha kota, ”weshyawa wadi wi siti thana oba dutu jalaya nam manushya wargayo da janathawo da jathihu da bhashawo da wethi. 16 oba dutu an dasaya ha mrugaya nam weshyawata waira banda, aa sahamulin ma nagna kara, age mansa ka, aa mulumanin ginnen dawana aya wethi. 17 manda, dewiyan wahansege wachanaya ishta wana thuru un wahansege kamaththa kirimata, thamange rajyaya eksith wa mrugayata dena lesa, un wahanse owunge sith kamathi karawu seka. 18 oba dutu sthriya nam polowe rajun kerehi rajakam karana maha nagaraya”yi kiwe ya.
